QuestData.Title: Blast of Spice Fish
QuestData.Description: I have an ingredient that will make my fruit irresistible.$b$bNot many remember the delicacy of manatrout liquor. Its pungent aroma, the unctuous mouthfeel...$b$bThe toads near the northern river concentrate this additive in their gizzards. Fetch some stomachs for me, and we will have plenty.
QuestData.RewardText: Manatrout was completely fished out of our harbors. Since the shield was raised all we have had of the liquor is memories on our palates.
